mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where you deserve everything without lifting a finger! Sign up today for our exclusive VIP banking experience.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I was at the coffee shop, you know, minding my own business and sipping on my $10 artisanal latte, when this peasant dares to bump into me. I mean, can you imagine the audacity? I spilled a single drop on my designer shoes! Naturally, I demanded compensation for the emotional distress and inconvenience caused. And you know what? They gave me a free latte and a voucher for a month of free coffee. It's about time people recognized my importance!
